conservative.name: Quickcasting
conservative.requirements: This special ability is available to all wizards and does not need to be acquired specially
conservative.special: Special: Normally, a character can only perform the action listed on one action card during his turn. However, spellcasters can attempt to both channel power and cast a spell on the same turn, if they are willing to accept more risk. For a character to cast a spell during the same turn the character channels, the player must add one extra challenge die [[DChal]] to the check to cast the spell
